item.title: Draft Post
item.description: Title 1 Title 2 Title 3 Title 4 normal negrito itálico riscado image inline code block code elixir defmodule Foo do def bar(x), when x == 0, do: x+1 end def bar(x) do x + 2 end end x = Foo.bar 0 y = Foo.bar 1 ^y = x + 1 python def foo(x): return x + 1 def bar(y): return y + 1 x = foo(1) y = bar(1) Js
